recs.title: Live European Tour Golf
recs.synopsis: Live coverage of the Italian Open golf on the European Tour.

recs.title: Sky Sports Today
recs.synopsis: News from the Barclays Premier League and beyond, plus a comprehensive round-up of the day's other sports news.

recs.title: NFL: Denver @ Kansas
recs.synopsis: Kansas City Chiefs welcome AFC West rivals Denver Broncos to Arrowhead Stadium in week two of the NFL season. Both teams began the new season with a win.

recs.title: Triathlon: Long Course Weekend
recs.synopsis: The Long Course Triathlon from Pembrokeshire, Wales, sees competitors navigate a 2.4-mile swim, a 112-mile bike ride and a 26.2-mile run over the course of a three-day weekend.

recs.title: Live Singapore GP: Practice 1
recs.synopsis: The 2015 Singapore Grand Prix at Singapore International Circuit as the opening practice session gets under way. Britain's Lewis Hamilton won here last year.

recs.title: Porsche Super Cup: Belgium
recs.synopsis: Round six of the 2015 Porsche Super Cup season at Circuit de Spa-Francorchamps in Stavelot, Belgium. Last year, New Zealand's Earl Bamber claimed victory after starting on pole position.

recs.title: Davis Cup Tennis: GB vs AUS
recs.synopsis: look ahead to the Davis Cup semi-final between Great Britain and Australia. Andy Murray is hoping to lead Britain into their first Davis Cup final for 37 years.

recs.title: FIFA World
recs.synopsis: A weekly football show that takes a closer look at major football news from around the world.

recs.title: Sports Unlimited 2015
recs.synopsis: The show that combines alternative, extreme and unusual sporting activities in dynamic style. A comprehensive round-up of local and international sports.

recs.title: WWE Raw
recs.synopsis: Michael Cole, Byron Saxton and JBL present Raw. Matches include Prime Time Players v The New Day and Big Show v Sting. This programme contains flashing images.
